post.summary: Creates a new version and returns parts of its metadata
post.description:
Creates a new version for a project. Requires the `create_version` permission in the project or owning organization.
Make sure you provide the contents of this request as multipart/form-data.
You can find a simple example implementation written in Java here: https://gist.github.com/kennytv/a227d82249f54e0ad35005330256fee2

parameters.name: slugOrId
parameters.description: The slug or id of the project to return versions for

files.description: The version files in order of selected platforms, if any

401.description: Api session missing, invalid or expired

403.description: Not enough permissions to use this endpoint

parameters.description: The author of the project to return versions for

parameters.description: The slug or id of the project to return versions for
